about.description: TEKORA and PietraNox represent the perfect alliance between technological innovation and premium quality. Our expertise in SPC flooring positions us as a major player in the sector, with products certified to the most demanding international standards.

items.title: Sustainability

hero.title: About TEKORA
hero.subtitle: Leader in the import and distribution of premium SPC flooring in Casablanca, in partnership with PietraNox for excellence quality.

story.title: TEKORA
story.content: TEKORA, based in Casablanca, specializes in the import and distribution of premium SPC (Stone Plastic Composite) flooring. Our products offer aesthetics and comfort equivalent to traditional parquet, while being significantly more resistant and durable.
story.content2: Compliant with Italian standards and certified FloorScore, CE, IAF, SGS, ISO9001, ISO14001, our flooring is adapted to 2G and 5G click systems. They guarantee quality, durability, and reliability for all your projects, whether residential or commercial.
story.content3: Our flooring is perfectly suited for homes, bathrooms, kitchens, offices, boutiques, hotels, and high-traffic establishments. With an excellent quality-price ratio and a 10-year warranty, we aim to establish lasting partnerships with real estate developers, architects, installers, and retailers.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: Key milestones that have shaped our success and growth over the years

missionVision.title: Our Commitment
missionVision.subtitle: A clear mission and an ambitious vision for the future of flooring

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide the highest quality SPC flooring solutions, adapted to all spaces and all users – individuals, professionals, and real estate developers – while respecting the environment.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become the reference partner for exceptional flooring projects, recognized for our expertise, innovation, and commitment to quality and sustainability.

pietranox.title: PietraNox
pietranox.content: PietraNox is an innovative company located in Casablanca, Morocco, specializing in the production of SPC (Stone Plastic Composite) flooring. Our business model is based on wholesale to retailers and distributors, as well as export to strategic markets such as the European Union and the United States, representing 85% of our revenue.
pietranox.content2: We primarily target construction and renovation companies, as well as distributors and importers looking for durable, aesthetic, and high-performance flooring solutions. Thanks to our technical expertise and quality commitment, PietraNox has established itself as a trusted partner for all your large-scale projects.

hero.title: SPC Flooring
hero.subtitle: Discover our exceptional range of premium SPC flooring, equivalent to parquet in aesthetics and comfort

features.title: Product Features
features.subtitle: Exceptional performance for all your spaces

water.title: Water Resistance
water.longDescription: Our SPC flooring is 100% waterproof, ideal for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. Waterproof technology ensures that neither humidity nor splashes compromise the floor's durability, providing unparalleled comfort and peace of mind.

fire.title: Fire Resistance
fire.longDescription: Safety is essential. Our SPC floors are fire resistant, reducing flammability risks and providing additional protection in homes and professional spaces. Compliant with EN 13501-1 standard (BFL-S1 Classification).

stain.title: Stain Resistance
stain.longDescription: Thanks to their anti-stain coating, these floors remain impeccable on a daily basis. Food, beverage, or household product splashes do not penetrate the surface, greatly facilitating cleaning and maintaining a floor that always looks new.

durability.title: Comfort and Durability
durability.longDescription: Our SPC flooring combines aesthetics and robustness: wood, stone, or concrete imitation, they bring elegance and modernity while resisting shocks, wear, and intensive traffic. Each floor is designed to last, with a 10-year warranty.

specs.title: Technical Specifications
specs.subtitle: Detailed specifications of our SPC flooring

items.label: Dimensions
items.value: Herringbone 750 x 150 mm and 1220 x 180 mm

pietranox.title: PietraNox
pietranox.subtitle: Premium SPC Production
pietranox.description: PietraNox specializes in the production of high-quality SPC flooring, with a focus on export to the EU and the United States. Our products meet the strictest standards.

cta.title: Need personalized advice?
cta.description: Our team of experts is at your disposal to guide you in your choice and support you in your project.

hero.title: Our Certifications
hero.subtitle: Excellence validated by the highest international standards

quality.title: Certified Quality
quality.description: Our certifications demonstrate our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. Every step of our process is rigorously controlled to ensure the highest quality standards.

list.name: ISO 9001:2015
list.description: Certified quality management system, ensuring optimized processes and continuous improvement.

list.name: ISO 14001:2015
list.description: Environmental certification attesting to our commitment to environmental protection.

list.name: FloorScore
list.description: Indoor air quality certification (SCS-EC10.3-2014 v4.0), guaranteeing ultra-low emissions.

list.name: CE Marking
list.description: Compliance with essential European Union requirements for our products.

commitment.title: Our Quality Commitment
commitment.description: We are committed to maintaining the highest quality standards in all our operations. Our products are made from 100% virgin raw materials, formaldehyde-free, phthalate-free, with ultra-low emissions (TVOC A+).
